pullrequest.title: Fix Issue #126: perception task starts before running state

content.raw: Note: these changes introduce a potential problem if the times specified in the xacro file are not given in ascending order. Since we are not sorting the queue ourselves, and we always check only the time of the object at the front of the queue, it is possible that we are not checking the lowest time. I think this is relatively minor because the user can just put the objects in ascending order of time as a work around. We could also eliminate the need for this by sorting the list of objects ourselves.
content.html: Note: these changes introduce a potential problem if the times specified in the xacro file are not given in ascending order. Since we are not sorting the queue ourselves, and we always check only the time of the object at the front of the queue, it is possible that we are not checking the lowest time. I think this is relatively minor because the user can just put the objects in ascending order of time as a work around. We could also eliminate the need for this by sorting the list of objects ourselves.
